Token.Abstract: * description: The plotOptions is a wrapper object for config objects for each series type. The config objects for each series can also be overridden for each series item as given in the series array. Configuration options for the series are given in three levels. Options for all series in a chart are given in the plotOptions.series object. Then options for all series of a specific type are given in the plotOptions of that type, for example plotOptions.line. Next, options for one single series are given in the series array.

* description: A polygon series can be used to draw any freeform shape in the cartesian coordinate system. A fill is applied with the color option, and stroke is applied through lineWidth and lineColor options. Requires the highcharts-more.js file.

* description: A polygon series can be used to draw any freeform shape in the cartesian coordinate system. A fill is applied with the color option, and stroke is applied through lineWidth and lineColor options. Requires the highcharts-more.js file.

* description: A solid gauge is a circular gauge where the value is indicated by a filled arc, and the color of the arc may variate with the value.
* description: A solid gauge is a circular gauge where the value is indicated by a filled arc, and the color of the arc may variate with the value.

* description: A word cloud is a visualization of a set of words, where the size and placement of a word is determined by how it is weighted.

* description: The area range series is a carteseian series with higher and lower values for each point along an X axis, where the area between the values is shaded. Requires highcharts-more.js.

* description: A 3D scatter plot uses x, y and z coordinates to display values for three variables for a set of data.

* description: A heatmap is a graphical representation of data where the individual values contained in a matrix are represented as colors.
* description: A heatmap is a graphical representation of data where the individual values contained in a matrix are represented as colors.

* description: Funnel charts are a type of chart often used to visualize stages in a sales project, where the top are the initial stages with the most clients. It requires that the modules/funnel.js file is loaded.

* description: A spline series is a special type of line series, where the segments between the data points are smoothed.
* description: A spline series is a special type of line series, where the segments between the data points are smoothed.

* description: A bullet graph is a variation of a bar graph. The bullet graph features a single measure, compares it to a target, and displays it in the context of qualitative ranges of performance that could be set using plotBands on yAxis.

* description: A bullet graph is a variation of a bar graph. The bullet graph features a single measure, compares it to a target, and displays it in the context of qualitative ranges of performance that could be set using plotBands on yAxis.

* description: A Sunburst displays hierarchical data, where a level in the hierarchy is represented by a circle. The center represents the root node of the tree. The visualization bears a resemblance to both treemap and pie charts.

* description: A treemap displays hierarchical data using nested rectangles. The data can be laid out in varying ways depending on options.

* description: Error bars are a graphical representation of the variability of data and are used on graphs to indicate the error, or uncertainty in a reported measurement.

* description: A vector plot is a type of cartesian chart where each point has an X and Y position, a length and a direction. Vectors are drawn as arrows.

* description: A variwide chart (related to marimekko chart) is a column chart with a variable width expressing a third dimension.

* description: A streamgraph is a type of stacked area graph which is displaced around a central axis, resulting in a flowing, organic shape.

* description: The X-range series displays ranges on the X axis, typically time intervals with a start and end date.

* description: Column series display one column per value along an X axis.

* description: Gauges are circular plots displaying one or more values with a dial pointing to values along the perimeter.

* description: A bubble series is a three dimensional series type where each point renders an X, Y and Z value. Each points is drawn as a bubble where the position along the X and Y axes mark the X and Y values, and the size of the bubble relates to the Z value. Requires highcharts-more.js.

* description: A bar series is a special type of column series where the columns are horizontal.

* description: A waterfall chart displays sequentially introduced positive or negative values in cumulative columns.

* description: The area spline range is a cartesian series type with higher and lower Y values along an X axis. The area inside the range is colored, and the graph outlining the area is a smoothed spline. Requires highcharts-more.js.

* description: The column range is a cartesian series type with higher and lower Y values along an X axis. Requires highcharts-more.js. To display horizontal bars, set chart.inverted to true.

* description: A sankey diagram is a type of flow diagram, in which the width of the link between two nodes is shown proportionally to the flow quantity.
* description: A sankey diagram is a type of flow diagram, in which the width of the link between two nodes is shown proportionally to the flow quantity.

* description: A scatter plot uses cartesian coordinates to display values for two variables for a set of data.

* description: A variable pie series is a two dimensional series type, where each point renders an Y and Z value. Each point is drawn as a pie slice where the size (arc) of the slice relates to the Y value and the radius of pie slice relates to the Z value. Requires highcharts-more.js.

* description: A variable pie series is a two dimensional series type, where each point renders an Y and Z value. Each point is drawn as a pie slice where the size (arc) of the slice relates to the Y value and the radius of pie slice relates to the Z value. Requires highcharts-more.js.

* description: A variable pie series is a two dimensional series type, where each point renders an Y and Z value. Each point is drawn as a pie slice where the size (arc) of the slice relates to the Y value and the radius of pie slice relates to the Z value. Requires highcharts-more.js.
* description: A pyramid series is a special type of funnel, without neck and reversed by default.
* description: A pyramid series is a special type of funnel, without neck and reversed by default.

* description: A bell curve is an areaspline series which represents the probability density function of the normal distribution. It calculates mean and standard deviation of the base series data and plots the curve according to the calculated parameters.

* description: A bell curve is an areaspline series which represents the probability density function of the normal distribution. It calculates mean and standard deviation of the base series data and plots the curve according to the calculated parameters.

* description: Wind barbs are a convenient way to represent wind speed and direction in one graphical form. Wind direction is given by the stem direction, and wind speed by the number and shape of barbs.

* description: Wind barbs are a convenient way to represent wind speed and direction in one graphical form. Wind direction is given by the stem direction, and wind speed by the number and shape of barbs.

* description: A box plot is a convenient way of depicting groups of data through their five-number summaries: the smallest observation (sample minimum), lower quartile (Q1), median (Q2), upper quartile (Q3), and largest observation (sample maximum).

* description: A box plot is a convenient way of depicting groups of data through their five-number summaries: the smallest observation (sample minimum), lower quartile (Q1), median (Q2), upper quartile (Q3), and largest observation (sample maximum).

* description: A pie chart is a circular graphic which is divided into slices to illustrate numerical proportion.
* description: A pie chart is a circular graphic which is divided into slices to illustrate numerical proportion.

* description: A pareto diagram is a type of chart that contains both bars and a line graph, where individual values are represented in descending order by bars, and the cumulative total is represented by the line.

* description: A pareto diagram is a type of chart that contains both bars and a line graph, where individual values are represented in descending order by bars, and the cumulative total is represented by the line.

* description: A line series displays information as a series of data points connected by straight line segments.

* description: A histogram is a column series which represents the distribution of the data set in the base series. Histogram splits data into bins and shows their frequencies.
